divs: sighting detailsi was letting the dog out before going to bed. i walked outside to see the full moon. i gazed around after seeing the moon and noticed a object in the sky to the west of my house and in the opposite direction of the moon. the angle was about 30 degrees to the west. the object was stationary in the sky. the altitude was about 2000 ft. all i could make out was flashing \ blinking colored lights. the colors were: red, white, green and blue. all blinking randomly and changing position. i thought i would have time, so i retrieved my binoculars. these helped resolve the lights better. however, i couldn't see an object \ main body. when i went to retrieve the binoculars i had my wife come see the lights as well. after looking at the lights for 10-20 minutes we went to bed. the next morning i wrote this report.
Summary: Blinking lights in the night sky
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sachse
There were no other sightings in Sachse on or around September 11th 2011
